tables.name: osmosis_arbitrage_trades
tables.description: Arbitrage trades data from the Cosmos ecosystem, showcasing opportunities where traders took advantage of price discrepancies across different blockchain networks.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the trade transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the trade transaction occurred, indicating the time of the trade.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the transaction in which the arbitrage trade occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within the transaction where the arbitrage trade was executed.

columns.name: exec_msg_index
columns.description: Index of the execute message within the transaction where the arbitrage trade was executed.

columns.name: arb_index
columns.description: Index of the arbitrage trade within the transaction.

columns.name: trader
columns.description: Identifier of the trader who executed the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: amount_in
columns.description: Quantity of the token being traded into the pool.

columns.name: amount_out
columns.description: Quantity of the token being traded out of the pool.

columns.name: arbitraged_token
columns.description: Token being arbitrated, involved in the price discrepancy.

columns.name: profit
columns.description: Profit made by the trader from the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: roi
columns.description: Return on Investment (ROI) for the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: pool_path
columns.description: Path of the liquidity pool used for the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: n_hops
columns.description: Number of hops taken to execute the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: n_pools
columns.description: Number of pools used to execute the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_asset_denoms
tables.description: This table contains information about asset denominations from various chains in the Cosmos ecosystem, including details about their tokens, origins, and sources.

columns.name: chain_name
columns.description: Name of the blockchain chain in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the token, as defined by the blockchain chain.

columns.name: token_name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the token.

columns.name: token_symbol
columns.description: Symbol representing the token.

columns.name: token_display
columns.description: Display value of the token, taking into account its exponent.

columns.name: token_exponent
columns.description: Exponent used to display the token value.

columns.name: coingecko_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the token on CoinGecko.

columns.name: native_chain_name
columns.description: Name of the native blockchain chain for the token.

columns.name: native_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the native token on the native blockchain chain.

columns.name: token_origin
columns.description: Origin of the token, including its creation and migration status.

columns.name: last_refresh
columns.description: Date and time when the data was last refreshed from the blockchain.

columns.name: ingestion_date
columns.description: Date and time when the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: is_gov_token
columns.description: Boolean indicating whether the token is a governance token.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Source of the data, including any relevant blockchain chain or network.

tables.name: osmosis_block_events
tables.description: This table provides information about the events occurring on the blockchain within the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the block height, timestamp, and event occurrences. The data is sourced from the blockchain to provide a comprehensive view of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within the blockchain, representing the number of blocks mined up to this point.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was mined, indicating the time at which the events occurred.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the block, identifying its position in the list of events.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, categorizing the type of action or transaction.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes associated with the event, providing more detailed information about the occurrence.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the data, indicating the blockchain or network from which the information was obtained.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to describe the structure of the data, ensuring consistency and compatibility.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, indicating the time at which the data was received.

tables.name: osmosis_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Blocks Dataset: This dataset contains information about blocks in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and block production. It includes data on block height, timestamp, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was produced.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators involved in the block production process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block data was ingested into the dataset.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total size of the messages included in the block, in bytes.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions included in the block.

tables.name: osmosis_delegate
tables.description: This table contains information about transactions and actions on the Cosmos blockchain, specifically related to validators and token transfers. It provides a detailed breakdown of each transaction, including sender and recipient information.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that processed the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new shares allocated to the sender as a result of the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides information about the attributes associated with events on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It allows for analysis of various event attributes across different blockchains.

columns.name: deprecated_warning
columns.description: Indicates if the attribute is deprecated, indicating a potential change in the future.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the Cosmos blockchain on which the event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The ID of the transaction in which the event occurred.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction in which it occurred.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The source of the event, indicating the module or contract that triggered it.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event in which it occurred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_ibc_transfer_delays
tables.description: This table provides insights into the delays experienced by IBC (Inter-Blockchain Communication) transfers on the Cosmos ecosystem. It helps analyze and understand the timing discrepancies between transfer initiation and acknowledgement on various blockchains.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the IBC transfer transaction.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the IBC transfer transaction was initiated.

columns.name: ack_block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the IBC transfer acknowledgement was received.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that initiated the IBC transfer transaction.

columns.name: tx_delay
columns.description: Time delay experienced by the IBC transfer transaction, calculated as the difference between the block timestamp and the acknowledgement block timestamp.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block where the IBC transfer transaction was initiated.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the IBC transfer data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_acknowledgement
tables.description: This table contains information about ICS-20 acknowledgement events from the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the blockchains' transactions and their associated acknowledgements.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the ICS-20 acknowledgement event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the ICS-20 acknowledgement event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that was acknowledged.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the ICS-20 acknowledgement event.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the ICS-20 acknowledgement event.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection associated with the ICS-20 acknowledgement event.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the acknowledgement event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_receive
tables.description: This table captures receiving ICS-20 token transfers within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the flow of tokens between accounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the ICS-20 message within the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the ICS-20 message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the token transfer

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the token transfer

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred (e.g., ATOM)

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the tokens transferred (e.g., uusd/ibc/BF4F...)

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information included with the token transfer

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the ICS-20 transfer

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the ICS-20 transfer

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection ID of the channel

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the token transfer

columns.name: ack
columns.description: The acknowledgement of the token transfer

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_transfer
tables.description: This table contains records of token transfers between connections within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the flow of assets across the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the transfer.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer within the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, which contains the transfer.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message, which contains the transfer.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account transferring the tokens.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account receiving the tokens.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the tokens transferred, representing their composition and hierarchy.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information or comments associated with the transfer.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the transfer.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the transfer.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection through which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transfer, indicating its position within the channel.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transfer was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_transfer_delays
tables.description: This dataset contains information about delayed ICS-20 transfers in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the transfers that took longer than expected to be processed on the Cosmos network.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the ICS-20 transfer transaction.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the ICS-20 transfer transaction was included.

columns.name: ack_block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the ICS-20 transfer transaction was acknowledged.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the ICS-20 transfer.

columns.name: tx_delay
columns.description: The delay in processing the ICS-20 transfer transaction, measured in blocks.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the ICS-20 transfer transaction was processed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_lock_tokens
tables.description: This table provides information on lock tokens in the Cosmos ecosystem, including the block height and timestamp of each transaction. It offers insights into the tokens being locked and the associated sender and pool information.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address of the sender who initiated the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The ID of the pool associated with the transaction.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens being locked.

columns.name: period_lock_id
columns.description: The ID of the period lock associated with the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_cl_create_position
tables.description: This table contains information about liquidity pool position creations in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides details about each position creation, including the tokens involved and the liquidity added.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the position creation transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the position creation transaction was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that created the liquidity pool position.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message (i.e., the position creation event) within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action (i.e., the position creation action) within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that created the liquidity pool position.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token involved in the liquidity pool position creation.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token involved in the liquidity pool position creation.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the liquidity pool in which the position was created.

columns.name: position_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the liquidity pool position that was created.

columns.name: lower_tick
columns.description: The lower tick value of the liquidity pool position.

columns.name: upper_tick
columns.description: The upper tick value of the liquidity pool position.

columns.name: liquidity
columns.description: The amount of liquidity added to the liquidity pool position.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the position creation data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_cl_withdraw_position
tables.description: This table provides information on liquidity provision (LP) withdrawal positions across the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains. It captures key details about each position, including the tokens involved and the liquidity provided.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the withdrawal transaction was executed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the withdrawal transaction was executed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier of the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token involved in the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token involved in the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the liquidity pool involved in the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: position_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the LP withdrawal position.

columns.name: lower_tick
columns.description: The lower tick value of the liquidity pool involved in the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: upper_tick
columns.description: The upper tick value of the liquidity pool involved in the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: liquidity
columns.description: The amount of liquidity provided by the LP withdrawal position.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_gamm_exit_pool
tables.description: This table contains information about token transfers in and out of liquidity pools on the Cosmos ecosystem, specifically related to the LP Gamm Exit Pool. It provides a record of all transactions involving this pool.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token transferred.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the liquidity pool.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_gamm_join_pool
tables.description: This table contains data from the liquidity pool join pool transactions on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into token transfers and pool activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred as part of the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token transferred.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the liquidity pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of messages from the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It provides information about the attributes associated with specific events on the blockchain.

columns.name: deprecated_warning
columns.description: Indicates if the attribute is deprecated, marking its potential removal in future updates.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event in the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute in the message.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_message_events
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive log of all blockchain events within the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing key aspects of block, transaction, and message processing. The data is sourced from various Cosmos-based blockchains, providing a unified view of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred (e.g., creation, execution, deletion).

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: A JSON object containing additional attributes of the event.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the event data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the event data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_message_senders
tables.description: This table contains information about senders of messages in the Cosmos ecosystem. It tracks the senders and their actions across various blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message was sent.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that contained the message.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender of the message.

columns.name: action
columns.description: The action taken by the sender (e.g., sending a token or executing a contract).

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_pools_liquidity
tables.description: This dataset provides information on the liquidity of pools in the Cosmos ecosystem, specifically the liquidity and pool shares per minute. It offers insights into the dynamic liquidity distribution across various pools.

columns.name: minute
columns.description: Timestamp of the minute when the liquidity snapshot was taken

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the pool

columns.name: liquidity_per_token
columns.description: Total liquidity per token in the pool, measured in a specific blockchain token (e.g., ATOM)

columns.name: usdc_liquidity
columns.description: Total liquidity in USDC (a stablecoin) in the pool

columns.name: pool_shares
columns.description: Number of shares representing the pool's ownership

tables.name: osmosis_pools_volume
tables.description: This table presents the total USDC volume for each pool in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into liquidity and trading activity across the network's various pools. By analyzing this data, users can gain a deeper understanding of the dynamics at play in the Cosmos ecosystem.

tables.name: osmosis_redelegate
tables.description: This table provides information on validator redelegations in the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes the block height and timestamp when the redelegation occurred, along with the sender and recipient validators, and the amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the redelegation was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The validator that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: src_validator
columns.description: The validator that the tokens were redelegated from.

columns.name: dst_validator
columns.description: The validator that the tokens were redelegated to.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens redelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_sends
tables.description: This table displays all the transactions (txs) sent across the Cosmos network, providing a comprehensive overview of the blockchain activity. It captures the key details of each transaction, including sender, recipient, and token transfers.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was mined.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was mined.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The type of action (e.g., transfer) performed in the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The address of the account that received the transaction.

columns.name: tokens_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: tokens_denom
columns.description: The denomination (e.g., atom, ubi, luna) of the tokens transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_superfluid_staking
tables.description: This table provides insights into Superfluid Staking on the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes information on transactions, bonding periods, and staking activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the blockchain block that contains the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the blockchain block was mined.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action number within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The identifier of the Superfluid Staking pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of coins staked or withdrawn.

columns.name: bonding_days
columns.description: The number of days the coins are bonded for staking.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_swaps
tables.description: This table contains records of swaps executed within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the assets exchanged, amounts, and the contracts involved in these transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the swap transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the swap transaction was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the swap transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_in
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the swap data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive collection of transaction data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain's activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within which the transaction was committed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information about the transaction, including its type and parameters.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A human-readable message describing the outcome of the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The amount of coins paid by the sender as a transaction fee.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The return code of the transaction, indicating its success or failure.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The total amount of gas consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested by the sender to execute the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the blockchain.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A note or comment left by the sender or receiver of the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the transaction schema used to validate the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the funds to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the transaction was executed in single-sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data containing information about the multi-signature transaction.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction will timeout if not executed.

tables.name: osmosis_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains transaction messages from various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the transactions and their associated details.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The identifier of the blockchain where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message sent in the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message sent in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_undelegate
tables.description: Undelegate operations on the Cosmos blockchain, providing insights into validators and token transfers. This data is extracted from the blockchain, offering a transparent view of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the undelegate operation was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the undelegate operation was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the undelegate operation.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator address of the account that initiated the undelegate operation.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens undelegated from the validator.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens undelegated from the validator.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegate operation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_validators
tables.description: This table tracks information about validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, including their operational details, commission rates, and tokens. It provides valuable insights into the validator landscape and their performance.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: Unique address of the validator operator.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Unique address of the validator's account.

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Public key used for consensus in the validator's blockchain.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Boolean indicating whether the validator is currently jailed.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the validator, e.g., bonded, unbonded, etc.

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: Number of tokens staked by the validator.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Human-readable name of the validator.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's identity key or public key.

columns.name: website
columns.description: Validator's website or documentation URL.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Validator's security contact email or keybase username.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details about the validator, e.g., their mission, nodes, etc.

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: Height at which the validator's unbonding period begins.

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: Time at which the validator's unbonding period begins.

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: Current commission rate of the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: Maximum commission rate allowed for the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: Maximum rate at which the validator's commission rate can change.

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: Time at which the validator's commission rate was last updated.

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum self-delegation amount required for the validator.

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: Height at which the validator's snapshot was last taken.

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: Time at which the validator's snapshot was last taken.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the data was ingested from the blockchain.

tables.name: osmosis_vote
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive record of all votes made within the Cosmos ecosystem. It covers various parameters, including sender, proposal ID, and voting options.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the vote was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the vote was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique hash identifying the transaction in which the vote was included.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The public address of the account that cast the vote.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the proposal being voted on.

columns.name: option
columns.description: The voting option selected by the sender (e.g., yes, no, abstain).

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the vote data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_withdraw_rewards
tables.description: This table contains information about rewards withdrawal events from the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides details about the transactions and actions performed by validators.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the withdrawal event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the withdrawal event occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that triggered the withdrawal event.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that performed the withdrawal.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator account that initiated the withdrawal event.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The human-readable name of the validator account.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the withdrawn rewards.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens withdrawn from the validator's account.

columns.name: token_amount_in_usdc
columns.description: The value of the withdrawn tokens in USDC.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the withdrawn tokens.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.
